title: Parity Check
description:
Write a PLC program that receives a data of variable data type 'value', which can be of type word, Dword, or LWord. The goal of the program is to calculate the number of 1s in the binary value of the data 'value', referred to as countBitsTrue, and based on the set parity mode 'odd', return the parity check result. The program also outputs the number of 0s in the binary value of the data 'value', referred to as countBitsFalse.

If odd=FALSE, it is even parity: return the check result as TRUE when countBitsTrue is even, otherwise return the check result as FALSE.
If odd=TRUE, it is odd parity: return the check result as TRUE when countBitsTrue is odd, otherwise return the check result as FALSE.
name: ParityVariant

input.name: odd
input.description:
Parity mode
FALSE: Even Parity
TRUE: Odd Parity

output.name: countBitsFalse
output.description: Number of FALSEs in the data

output.name: countBitsTrue
output.description: Number of TRUEs in the data
